items.question: How do I get started with meditation?
items.answer: Simply open the app and tap the "Meditate" button on the home screen. Choose a preset session or create your own custom session. The app will guide you through the meditation with optional bells and ambient sounds.

items.question: Does the app work offline?
items.answer: Yes! Slow Spot is designed to work 100% offline. All meditation sessions, sounds, and features are available without an internet connection. Your data is stored locally on your device.

items.question: How do I set up meditation reminders?
items.answer: Go to your Profile screen and tap "Schedule Reminder". You can choose your preferred time for daily meditation reminders. The app will request calendar permission to create these reminders.

items.question: Can I create custom meditation sessions?
items.answer: Yes! Tap the "+" button in the Meditation screen to create a custom session. You can customize the duration, ambient sounds, interval bells, and more.

items.question: How do I change the app language?
items.answer: Go to Settings and find the Language section. Slow Spot supports English, Polish, Spanish, German, French, Hindi, and Chinese.

items.question: How do I delete my data?
items.answer: Go to Settings > Data & Privacy > "Clear Data" to delete all your local data. Alternatively, uninstalling the app will remove all data from your device. Since we don't store any data on servers, there's nothing else to delete.

items.question: Is my data private?
items.answer: Absolutely. Slow Spot doesn't collect, transmit, or store any of your personal data on external servers. All your meditation history, preferences, and progress remain on your device only.

items.question: The app is not working properly. What should I do?
items.answer: Try these steps: 1) Close and reopen the app, 2) Restart your device, 3) Make sure you have the latest version from App Store or Google Play. If the problem persists, please contact us with details about the issue.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Slow Spot ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how our mobile meditation application handles your information.

philosophy.title: Our Privacy Philosophy
philosophy.simpleText: Your data stays on your device. We don't collect, transmit, or store any of your personal information on external servers.
philosophy.offline: Slow Spot is designed to operate 100% offline. All your meditation sessions, preferences, and personal data remain private and stored locally on your device.

notCollect.title: Information We Do NOT Collect
notCollect.intro: We want to be crystal clear about what we DON'T do:
items: We do NOT collect your name, email, or any personal identifiers
We do NOT track your location
We do NOT collect your meditation intentions or personal notes
We do NOT use analytics or tracking services
We do NOT share your data with third parties
We do NOT transmit any data to external servers
We do NOT use cookies or similar tracking technologies
We do NOT serve advertisements

localStorage.title: Information Stored Locally on Your Device
localStorage.intro: The following information is stored ONLY on your device using secure local storage:

preferences.title: User Preferences
items: Language selection (English, Polish, Spanish, German, French, Hindi, Chinese)
Theme preference (Light, Dark, or System)

history.title: Meditation Session History
items: Session duration and completion date
Session type (e.g., Morning Awakening, Loving Kindness)
Custom session configurations (if you create custom sessions)
history.purpose: To track your meditation progress and maintain streaks

statistics.title: Progress Statistics
items: Total sessions completed
Total minutes meditated
Current and longest meditation streaks
Achievement progress (e.g., "10 sessions completed" badge)
statistics.purpose: To motivate and celebrate your meditation journey

calendar.title: Calendar Events (Optional)
items: Meditation reminders (if you enable calendar integration)
Stored in: Your device's native calendar app
calendar.purpose: To help you maintain a consistent meditation practice

required.title: Required Permissions
required.content: None. The app works without any required permissions.

optional.title: Optional Permissions
optional.intro: The following permissions are optional and only used if you choose to enable specific features:

calendar.title: Calendar Access
calendar.why: To schedule meditation reminders in your device's calendar
calendar.when: Only when you tap "Schedule Reminder" in the Profile screen
calendar.what: Creates recurring meditation reminders at your chosen time
calendar.disable: Disable this anytime by deleting the calendar events or denying permission

local.title: Local Storage Only
local.content: All data is stored using your device's secure local storage.

network.title: No Network Transmission
network.content: The app operates in airplane mode compatible fashion. Your meditation data never leaves your device.

noAccount.title: No Account Required
noAccount.content: You don't need to create an account, provide an email, or sign in. Start meditating immediately.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Slow Spot does not collect any data from anyone, including children under 13 (or 16 in the EU). The app is family-friendly and suitable for all ages.

access.title: Right to Access
access.intro: All your data is visible within the app:
items: View your meditation history in the Profile screen
View your statistics and progress in the Profile screen
View your custom sessions in the Meditation screen

delete.title: Right to Delete
delete.intro: You can delete your data at any time:
items: Individual sessions: Long-press a custom session and select "Delete"
All app data: Use "Clear Data" in Settings or uninstall the app
delete.note: There is no "account" to delete because we don't store your data anywhere except your device.

notUse.title: We Do NOT Use:
items: Analytics services (no Google Analytics, Firebase Analytics, etc.)
Advertising networks
Social media SDKs
Cloud storage services
Backend servers or APIs

audio.title: Audio Content Sources:
audio.content: The meditation bells and ambient sounds included in the app are sourced from royalty-free, Creative Commons (CC0) licensed content. These services do NOT have access to your app usage or personal data.

legal.title: Legal Compliance
items: GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation - EU)
CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act - USA)
COPPA (Children's Online Privacy Protection Act - USA)
Apple App Store Review Guidelines
Google Play Store Developer Policy

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.intro: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. When we do:

We'll notify you via an in-app message for major changes

trust.content: We built Slow Spot with privacy as a core principle, not an afterthought. Your meditation practice is personal and sacred. We will never compromise your privacy for profit or analytics.
